price: ហើយខ្ញុំធ្លាប់មានទោសឧក្រិដ្ឋចំពោះពួកគេ។ ដូចេ្នះខ្ញុំខ្លាច ពួកគេនឹងសម្លាប់ខ្ញុំវិញ។
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
